author: Cortex XSOAR

commands.description: Looks up the classification for each of the specified IP addresses.
commands.name: ip

commands.description: Adds the specified IP address to the allow list.
commands.name: zscaler-whitelist-ip

commands.description: Deletes the IP destination groups for the specified group ID.
commands.name: zscaler-delete-ip-destination-groups

commands.description: Retrieves the Zscaler default allow list.
commands.name: zscaler-get-whitelist

commands.description: Get a list of departments. It can be searched by name.
commands.name: zscaler-get-departments

commands.description: Gets a list of all IP destination groups or the IP destination group information for the specified group ID.
commands.name: zscaler-list-ip-destination-groups

commands.description: Get Zscaler users.
commands.name: zscaler-get-users

commands.description: Updates the IP destination group information for the specified group ID.
commands.name: zscaler-edit-ip-destination-group

commands.description: Adds URLs to the specified category.
commands.name: zscaler-category-add-url

commands.description: Retrieves a list of all categories.
commands.name: zscaler-get-categories

commands.description: Adds the specified URLs to the allow list.
commands.name: zscaler-whitelist-url

commands.description: Retrieves the Zscaler default block list.
commands.name: zscaler-get-blacklist

commands.description: Removes the specified IP addresses from the allow list.
commands.name: zscaler-undo-whitelist-ip

commands.description: Adds the specified URLs to the block list.
commands.name: zscaler-blacklist-url

commands.description: Adds IP address to the specified category.
commands.name: zscaler-category-add-ip

commands.description: Removes the specified IP addresses from the block list.
commands.name: zscaler-undo-blacklist-ip

commands.description: Retrieves a full or summary report of the file that was analyzed by Sandbox. The file is represented by the specified MD5 hash.
commands.name: zscaler-sandbox-report

commands.description: Removes the specified URLs from the allow list.
commands.name: zscaler-undo-whitelist-url

commands.description: Removes the specified URLs from the block list.
commands.name: zscaler-undo-blacklist-url

commands.description: Gets a list of groups.
commands.name: zscaler-get-usergroups

commands.description: Looks up the classification for the each of the specified URLs.
commands.name: url

commands.description: Manually create a Zscaler login session. This command will also try to log out of the previous session.
commands.name: zscaler-login

commands.description: Adds a new IP destination group.
commands.name: zscaler-create-ip-destination-group

commands.description: Removes IP address from the specified category.
commands.name: zscaler-category-remove-ip

commands.description: Activates the changes executed by other Zscaler commands in this session.
commands.name: zscaler-activate-changes

commands.description: Gets information on the number of unique URLs that are currently provisioned for your organization as well as how many URLs you can add before reaching that number.
commands.name: zscaler-url-quota

commands.description: Logs out of the current Zscaler session.
commands.name: zscaler-logout

commands.description: Updates the user information for the specified ID.
commands.name: zscaler-update-user

commands.description: Adds the specified IP addresses to the block list.
commands.name: zscaler-blacklist-ip

commands.description: Removes URLs from the specified category.
commands.name: zscaler-category-remove-url

integration.description: Zscaler is a cloud security solution built for performance and flexible scalability. This integration enables you to manage URL and IP address allow lists and block lists, manage and update categories, get Sandbox reports, create, manage, and update IP destination groups and manually log in, log out, and activate changes in a Zscaler session.
integration.name: Zscaler Internet Access

playbook.description:
This playbook blocks domains using Zscaler.
The playbook checks whether the Zscaler integration is enabled, whether the Domain input has been provided and if so, blocks the domain.
playbook.name: Block Domain - Zscaler

description: Zscaler is a cloud security solution built for performance and flexible scalability.
name: Zscaler Internet Access
